sentences.en: " But , how can I open the grave by myself ? I had better consult with Abbess Shih. "
sentences.cn: “ 我一人如何掘得开坟墓? 且和石道姑商量则个. ”

sentences.en: " We fear reprisals, signore, " the abbess murmured.
sentences.cn: “ 我们怕报复, 先生, ” 女修道院院长喃喃地说.

sentences.en: A nun in charge of a priory or ranking next below the abbess of an abbey.
sentences.cn: 由小修道院院长主持的或由女修道院院长主持的修道院.

sentences.en: Abbess Julia : Yes , I have to pay a visit.
sentences.cn: 是的, 我想去拜访一下.

sentences.en: At age 43 she became abbess of her community.
sentences.cn: 43岁时她成为当地的女修道院院长.

sentences.en: Franlein Maria, I don't know how much the Mother Abbess has told you?
sentences.cn: 玛丽亚小姐, 我不知道院长嬷嬷都跟你说了些什么?

sentences.en: Irish abbess; a patron saint of Ireland.
sentences.cn: 爱尔兰女修道院院长; 爱尔兰守护神.

sentences.en: Now the abbess is making her case for a religious life removed from worldly distractions-on the internet's world wide web.
sentences.cn: 如今，这位女修道院院长正在国际互联网路上的“全球网”超级档上为超凡拔俗的宗教生活阐明自己的立场。

sentences.en: Once upon a time, there was an abbess in a small abbey .
sentences.cn: 很久以前，一个小修道院里有一个女修道院院长。
这位女修道院长并非是孤家寡人.

sentences.en: The superior of an abbey is called an abbess.
sentences.cn: 修道院的院长被称为女修道院院长.

sentences.en: There may be someone on earth —a cloistered abbess, perhaps, or a Taliban soldier in a particularly remote post —who has yet to learn that High School Musical 3 opened last Friday.
sentences.cn: 大概只有隐居的女修道院长和遥远的海报上的塔利班士兵才不知道歌舞青春3在上周五上映了吧。

words.tran_cn: 神父，僧侣；男修道院院长
大修道院，大寺院；修道院中全体修士或修女
女修道院院长；女庵主持

trans.tran_en: a woman who is in charge of a  convent (=  a place where a group of  nun s  live  )
